resource: 1002410.vtc=true 1002410.derived=false 1002410.description=The Toyota Yaris received the lowest number of problems per 100 vehicles among sub-compact cars in the proprietary J.D. Power and Associates 2012 Vehicle Dependability StudySM. Study based on 31,325 consumer responses measuring problems consumers experienced in the past 12 months with three-year-old vehicles (2009 model year cars and trucks). Proprietary study results are based on experiences and perceptions of consumers surveyed October-December 2011. Your experiences may vary. Visit jdpower.com 1002410.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
